snippet: With just four teams training on the Atlantic Coast, the Mets run into the Marlins a lot. On Sunday, they pounded Miami, 11-0, as Matt Harvey pitched four strong innings.
lead_paragraph: With just four teams training on the Atlantic Coast, the Mets run into the Marlins a lot. On Sunday, they pounded Miami, 11-0, as Matt Harvey pitched four strong innings.

headline.main: Familiarity Is the Theme of the Mets’ Schedule in Spring Training
headline.print_headline: Familiarity Is the Theme of the Mets’ Schedule in Spring Training
